utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: So I'd love to start by hearing about the last time you had coffee - what was going on, and what made you decide to have it then?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: last time i had a coffee this morning. i woke up, made breakfast for kids and then made a cup of instant coffee with a sandwich for myself. This cup helped me to wake up and get through the morning routine quickly.

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: Beyond waking up and getting through the morning routine, what else does that cup of coffee do for you during that time with your kids?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: nothing else really

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: What other times during your day do you find yourself reaching for coffee?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: i usually have another cup mid morning, to maintain the focus during the most productive part of the day. I also have another cup in the afternoon to help me stay productive till the evening

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: What else matters to you about being able to maintain that productivity throughout your day?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: i do not understand the question

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: Let me ask it differently - when you're able to stay productive from morning through evening with your coffee, what does that make possible for you?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: Ah, i can stay productive, i can focus on things that matter, and meet the daily goals

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: When you're able to meet those daily goals, what does that do for you?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: I feel satisfied and proud of myself, I feel like i did the right thing

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: When you feel that sense of pride and satisfaction from doing the right thing, what does that mean for how you see yourself?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: I realise my potential and inspire others

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: When you think about inspiring others through your coffee ritual and realizing your potential, what does being that kind of person mean to you?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: Probably reliable, trustworthy

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: When you think about being reliable and trustworthy through something as simple as your daily coffee routine, why does that matter to you?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: I do not really think about it in this way, coffee is just one of many things that help me be like that.

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: What would it mean for you if you couldn't rely on coffee as one of those things that helps you show up as reliable and trustworthy?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: i would have to find some other way to support me throughout the day. maybe have some short physical exercise breaks.

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: Thank you so much for sharing your thoughts with me today. Before we wrap up, I'm curious - when you think about your coffee routine and how it supports you throughout your day, what does having that kind of support system in place say about what matters most to you in your daily life?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: it means that even simple rituals can be helpful in achieving greater goal

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: Thank you for sharing your thoughts with me today. This has been very helpful.

nodes.label: get through the morning routine quickly
most productive part of the day
coffee is just one of many things
help me be reliable and trustworthy
find some other way to support me throughout the day
